locations.name: Kinabatangan River Area
locations.description: Likely staying at a jungle lodge along the river. This location is central to the described wildlife experiences like river cruises to see proboscis monkeys, pygmy elephants, and hornbills, as well as jungle treks.

locations.name: Coastal Island (Celebes Sea)
locations.description: An idyllic island resort/accommodation off Sabah's coast in the Celebes Sea, serving as a base for diving and snorkeling activities among coral reefs. Mabul Island coordinates used as a representative example of islands in this region known for diving/snorkeling access.
